TopicTitle: How do I refuel the Dragon Rider Capsule?

Articles.Content:
So yeah, I'm doing a Duna mission, and I want to land it on Duna, take it up to orbit, refuel it, go back to kerbin with an IP stage, and then land using it's own engines on KSC.

I know it says monopropell... on the green fuel line, but I can't find the "fuel tank" part of the model to click on it and transfer fuel.

HAAAALP!
